DontShowWelcome.Name: Don't show this message again
DontShowWelcome.Hint: Don't show the welcome application when Foundry first loads. (You can always undo this via Configure Settings).
DontShowWelcome.Support: If you wish to support the development of this module, please consider a monthly donation via
DontShowWelcome.Bugs: Bugs or feature requests can be reported via

DontShowWelcome.Introduction: This module provides automation for Final Fantasy XIV combat. It is currently in development and not all actions are automated yet.
